column5: i think is next saturday in the Kawarthas, is this correct?? thanks a lot

It all depends on where, check the regs I believe its the 2nd saturday in May but make sure with your regs because that area has a ton of sanctuaries and are closed until like the 4th saturday in May, go check it out before fishing because all along the Otonabee there are sanctuaries, and a bunch of lakes have no fishing in this time just make sure so your not fishing a sanctuary.
Come on guys , to answer ur question correctly and honestly it's tonight

If you are talking about the Kawarthas as in Zone 17 no it's not until the 2nd saturday in May. Zone 15 3rd sat in may and all others around are 2nd sat in may. The 7th is ony the first sat so I'm sure it's as I said.
where....  may 1st is Georgian Bay May 7 is Bay Of Quinte May14 is Kawarthas and simcoe and most other places
May 13th here in Quebec. Seasons always start on a Friday, don't ask me why, I have no idea.
well quebec is a distinct society....LOL......  I wish they would start on the friday here
